short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Make online reading easy and highlight your favorite search terms

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Your reading, simplified.
Easily enlarge text, switch to dark mode and focus on what matters.

Transform your online reading experience with Textune. This lightweight Chrome extension offers easy text adjustment, reading mode, quick search and dark mode to make web browsing comfortable for all. Perfect for those who value clarity and comfort, Textune is designed to reduce eye strain and enhance concentration.
 
"Ask Anything" box: Quick search from within the Textune utility bar.
The search from Ask anything search box may be redirected to a search engine selected by Textune, in order to provide you with the best results we believe to be possible. The search can be redirected to Google search box, Bing search, Yahoo search, or a different search engine, selected by Textune.

By using the "Ask Anything" search box you agree that the search terms may be recorded anonymously. And used to improve suggestions in future searches.

Quick links marker:
New! When Textune identifies a term that may be of special interest to you, it may mark it as a link, to help you further inspect your interest in it.
